name: Super Cauldron
description:
Super Cauldron is an arcade-platformer game developed by Titus Software and Titus Interactive. It was originally released in 1992. It was published by Titus Interactive.
You can play Super Cauldron on Atari ST, Commodore / Amiga and PC.
Christian Lier (CPC) and Grégory Makles (Amiga) scored the game.
